titles.title: Investment Assets Security Act of 2001
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to reduce the holding period for long-term capital gain treatment to 6 months.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 3/27/2001--Introduced. Investment Assets Security Act of 2001 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to reduce from one year to six months the holding period of investment assets required for long-term capital gain (or loss) treatment.
